sophiabcrypt

Class SbcPlanFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • sophiabcrypt.SbcPlanFile

  • public class SbcPlanFile
extends java.lang.Object
    This class control all details about Encrypt and Decrypt operations. Get all files, folders and subfolders, Count files, Control Process Bar, Set encrypted file extension Control max file lenght, and others!
    Since:
    Sep/2018
    Author:
    CesarBianchi
    See Also:
    SbcEncEngine, SbcEncryptor

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DiscoveryFiles(java.lang.String cPath)
      This method can discovery all files inside a specific path and add to List of files.

      Return array with all files to be process (full path filename)
      java.lang.String getOperType()
      Return the operation type class attribute (Encrypt or Decrypt)
      int getQtdFiles()
      Return the quantity files to be process
      int getQtdSubDir()
      Gets the quantity of subdirs present in master directory selected by user
      void init(java.lang.String cOperType)
      This is a constructor method of class The operations are: 1 - Sets operation type (Encrypt or Decrypt) 2 - Sets kind of The bar of path files 3 - Sets what files are be process 4 - Sets the final extesion of Encrypted files 5 - Sets the maximum lenght of files are be process
      void listConsoleFiles()
      List in console out all files added to aFiles class atribute
      void listConsoleSubDir()
      List at Console Out all subdirectories presents at List of Paths

      Return the quantity of files to be process

      Sets operation type class attribute (Encrypt or Decrypt)

        public void init(java.lang.String cOperType)
        This is a constructor method of class The operations are: 1 - Sets operation type (Encrypt or Decrypt) 2 - Sets kind of The bar of path files 3 - Sets what files are be process 4 - Sets the final extesion of Encrypted files 5 - Sets the maximum lenght of files are be process

        cOperType - The type of process (ENC or DEC)
